title: Problem with our work emails - "A valid lincense could not be found"
content:
Hi there,

we have a problem with our work email. It is operated on Microsoft Office platform. However half of the people in our company uses Thunderbird over MS Outlook. Few days ago our mail clients stopped to work on Thunderbird. I enslose the screenshot. On Outlook its still fine and working. Licence with Microsoft is therefore valid. Ohter mails(my private mail, or my second wokr email) work with the Thundrbird still fine.

Can you please help us, working in Outlook is terrible and making my life hell. We would like to stay on Thunderbird. Thanks a lot and have a nice day, Petr.

creator: mpolster

title: Emails getting corrupted (102.11.0 64 bit Ubuntu 22.04.2)
content:
I have now seen a number of Emails corrupted and not just in the inbox (cf. https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1410819). I also see a closed topic with no clear resolutions about corruption (https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1381880). I have no antivirus software running and can see no regularities in which messages are getting corrupted. The form of the corruption is that some of the message is retained, but without formatting and with some of the html code (I think, I confess I didn't look closely enough before trying properties, repair ... which did repair it to my surprise, I did try ctrl-U to see the source which showed nothing at all, not even what I could see in the normal view).

I realise that this doesn't make this a very helpful report but the issue is serious enough that I thought I should report it. I will watch carefully for future examples. Is there anything that I should do to get more information assuming, as I fear, that I will see more of this? For now do I just ignore suggestions to compact (I have that on manual) as there looks to be a suggestion that compacting has caused corruption in the past?

TIA,

Chris
creator: cpsyctc

title: After Thunderbird update, Mail will not send - caused by scroll lock - Bizzare fix/Resolve
content:
After updating my Monzilla Thunderbird program all my mail "sending" would not work. Not any of the 3 providers. In-coming was fine, but out-going did not work. I got an error of VO1 and comments about sending spam. Prior to the update, all worked fine.

Shut my VPN off, AV and Firewall not changed. Note: I build my own computers, made gaming systems, have my own home server, and more.... so despite being nearly 70 years, been around computers since the Altair days.

After the update.... spent some time pulling my hair out trying to resolve this problem. I am running Windows 10 Pro (latest updates) with 32GB RAM and all the normal crap.... computer works fine.

Resolve: What i found was when the "scroll lock" button was (ON), I guess I accidentally hit the button, my Monzilla TB mail would not send, only receive. THIS IS CRAZY !!! Anyway, after turning "off" or disable the Scroll Lock key on my keyboard.... Monzilla mail worked again sending normally.

This one is for the Birds... but it fixed my problem. I am not a programmer, only end user and reporting what happened to me.
creator: nh199262

title: Changing my Waitrose.com address to Gmail
content:
I am a Plusnet user who, along with all other members, am about to lose my Waitrose.com address (on an IMAP Server) because it will no lomger be supported by Plusnet.I inherited my Waitrose.com address at the time Plusnet / BT took on Waitrose (and John Lewis) Internet.

My Plusnet address remains, but only for Plusnet membership traffic. They advise me to urgently replace Waitrose.com with my Gmail address - which had been dormant since my difficulty in using my Mobile Phone for certain reasons.

I understand that Gmail will cooperate with my Tbird Ver. 102 (on Win 10 PC), but am asking if I will be able to contain Google in a new alternative Folder system alonside my existing Waitrose History? I really do hope so.
creator: peetrobo

title: How to Change from POP Basic Auth to "Exchange"?  See message below!
content:
I received this email from Godaddy regarding my Office 365 email accounts:

"Update your settings to keep your email app access working.

There are email accounts in your organization using Basic Authentication, which Microsoft will no longer support after 05/24/2023. You'll still be able to access your email through your browser, but not from an email app, such as Outlook or Apple Mail — don't worry, none of your emails will be lost.

In order to continue using your email apps, you need to update your settings from POP/IMAP to Exchange for each device you use to check your email. This also applies to other users who are set up within your account using POP/IMAP settings. Here's how to update your email settings."

HOW DO I CHANGE THIS IN THUNDERBIRD?

Thank you,
creator: Phillip16

title: Must I have so many subfolders?

Sincerely, Nancy

creator: email14

title: Google Calendars sometimes not installing
content:
Hey, I have 6 different parent email addresses in thunderbird that are all google workspace email accounts. They all have calendars. In other mail clients, when I log in to any of these email accounts, the google calendars are found right away and viewable in the mail clients. With thunderbird, there are a small handfull of the email accounts who's calendars are never found.

I've removed the email profile, completely remoted thunderbird from my machine, re installed, and the same mail clients have the same issue. This morning I installed thunderbird on another machine, set up the same email addresses, and again the same ones never find their associated calendars. I also just set up thunderbird for someone else this morning and they have had the same issue, which has finally bought me to making this post.

It's the only frustration I have with using thunderbird, and I'd really appreciate anyone's insight in to why some calendars are loaded and not others, and what gmail settings I might need to change to fix this.

Thank you!
creator: info9239
